channel.name: Cooking Channel US
channel.title: Man Finds Food
channel.desc: Adam Richman's years of experience crisscrossing the U.S. to find delicious food items in off-the-grid establishments comes in handy once again. The longtime host of the iconic Travel Channel series "Man v Food," Richman has tasted countless culinary gems and introduced viewers to platefuls of cuisine secrets buried in the American food scene. He's at it again in "Man Finds Food," on the prowl for off-the-menu items - available only to connected connoisseurs - served at out-of-the-way eateries. Whether it's smoked redfish on the half shell in New Orleans; braised short ribs in Honolulu; a Reuben omelet and French toast combo in Las Vegas; or lamb shank pie in Boston, Richman finds tasty treasures and meets, greets and eats with some of the most interesting people in America.
